title: Commands
content: command explanation more info whoami returns current user manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman1whoami1html lsmod Show the status of modules in the Linux Kernel manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8lsmod8html dmesg print or control the kernel ring buffer manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman1dmesg1html usermod modify a user account manhttpslinuxdienetman8usermod groupmod modify a group definition on the system manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8groupmod8html chown change file owner and group manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman1chown1html fdisk manipulate disk partition table manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8fdisk8html mount mount a filesystem manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8mount8html hwinfo probe for hardware manhttpssaratacommanpageshwinfo8html sysctl configure kernel parameters at runtime manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8sysctl8html systemctl Control the systemd system and service manager manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman1systemctl1html ifconfig configure a network interface manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8ifconfig8html ip show manipulate routing network devices interfaces and tunnels manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman8ip8html dig DNS lookup utility manhttpslinuxizecomposthowtousedigcommandtoquerydnsinlinux pstree display a tree of processes manhttpsman7orglinuxmanpagesman1pstree1html
